golad.lib.impl

Class AbstractMutableBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • golad.lib.impl.AbstractBoard
      • golad.lib.impl.AbstractMutableBoard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Board, MutableBoard
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultBoard

    public abstract class AbstractMutableBoard
extends AbstractBoard
implements MutableBoard
    A basic abstract implementation of a MutableBoard.
    Author:
    Megacrafter127
    See Also:
    Board, AbstractBoard, DefaultBoard

    • Method Detail

      • copy

        public void copy(Board src,
        int srcx,
        int srcy,
        int trgx,
        int trgy,
        int w,
        int h)
          throws NullPointerException,
                 IndexOutOfBoundsException
        Description copied from interface: MutableBoard
        Copies the CellStates of a specified rectangular area of another Board.
        Specified by:
        copy in interface MutableBoard
        Parameters:
        src - The Board to copy from
        srcx - The X coordinate of the top-leftmost cell of the area to copy from
        srcy - The Y coordinate of the top-leftmost cell of the area to copy from
        trgx - The X coordinate of the top-leftmost cell of the area to copy into
        trgy - The Y coordinate of the top-leftmost cell of the area to copy into
        w - The width of the copied area
        h - The height of the copied area
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If src is null.
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - If any part of the area to copy from or to is outside of the respective Board.
